The best soundbar deals are still live after Prime Day — save on the Sonos Ray, Vizio V-Series, and more
item.description: Shop the best soundbar deals still live after October Prime Day at Amazon, including Sonos, Sony, Vizio, and more.

item.title: Deals under $25 still live after Prime Day: AirTags, speakers, more
item.description: Prime Day isn't just for big purchases. Score a Blink security camera, Anker wireless charger, Soundcore earbuds, and more — all for under $25 following the event.

item.title: October Prime Day is over but no one told these wireless earbud deals
item.description: We're tracking the top deals on wireless earbuds following Prime Big Deal Days. Shop sales on AirPods — even the new AirPods 4 with Active Noise Cancellation.

item.title: All the good Chromebook deals post-Prime Day are at Best Buy
item.description: Any good Chromebook deals at Amazon left with Prime Big Deal Days, but Best Buy has several good options left from Acer and Asus.

item.title: Most good Bluetooth speaker deals are still around the day after Prime Day
item.description: Amazon's Prime Big Deal Days has ended, but deals on JBL Flip and Sony X-Series Bluetooth speakers are still kicking.

item.title: Bose Ultra Open Earbuds hit new low price after Prime Day
item.description: Bose's Ultra Open Earbuds hit an all-time-low price on Amazon despite Prime Day wrapping up.
